test_info.description: Serinin yirmi yedinci testi. 2.6-3.0 zorluk seviyesinde. Dolaylı Anlatım (Reported Speech) kuralları. Zamanların bir derece geçmişe kaydırılması (Backshift).

questions.t: Ali said: 'I am tired.' -> Ali said that he _____ tired.
questions.h:
Doğrudan cümlede 'am' (Present) kullanılmış. Aktarırken bir derece geçmişe gidilir.

KISA DERS: Reported Speech'te 'am/is' -> 'was'a dönüşür. He said he was tired.

questions.t: She said: 'I work in a bank.' -> She said that she _____ in a bank.
questions.h:
Doğrudan cümlede fiil 'work' (Simple Present). Aktarırken Simple Past olur.

KISA DERS: Simple Present (V1) -> Simple Past (V2). Work -> Worked.

questions.t: He told me: 'I will call you.' -> He told me that he _____ call me.
questions.h:
Doğrudan cümlede 'will' var. Geçmiş hali nedir?

KISA DERS: Reported Speech'te 'Will' -> 'Would'a dönüşür.

questions.t: They said: 'We are watching TV.' -> They said that they _____ watching TV.
questions.h:
Doğrudan cümlede 'are watching' (Present Continuous) var.

KISA DERS: Present Continuous (are) -> Past Continuous (were) olur.

questions.t: She said: 'I can swim.' -> She said that she _____ swim.
questions.h:
Doğrudan cümlede 'can' var.

KISA DERS: Can -> Could.

questions.t: Tom said: 'I have finished my homework.' -> Tom said that he _____ finished his homework.
questions.h:
Doğrudan cümlede 'have finished' (Present Perfect) var.

KISA DERS: Present Perfect (Have/Has) -> Past Perfect (Had) olur.

questions.t: She said: 'I don't like coffee.' -> She said that she _____ like coffee.
questions.h:
Doğrudan cümlede 'don't like' (Geniş Zaman Olumsuz) var.

KISA DERS: Don't/Doesn't -> Didn't olur.

questions.t: He said: 'My car is new.' -> He said that _____ car was new.
questions.h:
Zamir değişimi. Konuşan kişi bir erkek (He). 'Benim arabam' dedi.

KISA DERS: Konuşan 'He' olduğu için 'My' -> 'His' olur.

questions.t: They told us: 'We lived in Paris.' -> They told us that they _____ in Paris.
questions.h:
Dikkat! Doğrudan cümlede zaten 'lived' (Past Tense) var. Geçmişin de geçmişine gitmelisin.

KISA DERS: Simple Past (V2) -> Past Perfect (Had + V3) olur. Lived -> Had lived.

questions.t: Mary said: 'I must go.' -> Mary said that she _____ go.
questions.h:
'Must' kelimesinin geçmiş zaman hali (zorunluluk) nedir?

KISA DERS: Reported Speech'te 'Must' genellikle 'Had to'ya dönüşür.

questions.t: He said: 'I am going to buy a house.' -> He said he _____ going to buy a house.
questions.h:
Doğrudan cümle: 'am going to'.

KISA DERS: Am/Is going to -> Was going to.

questions.t: She told him: 'I will help you.' -> She told him she would help _____.
questions.h:
Zamir değişimi. Kime söylüyor? 'Him' (Ona - erkeğe).

KISA DERS: 'You' zamiri, dinleyen kişiye (him) göre değişir. You -> Him.

questions.t: They said: 'We are happy.' -> They said that _____ were happy.
questions.h:
Konuşanlar 'They' (Onlar). Kendilerine 'We' (Biz) diyorlar.

KISA DERS: We -> They.

questions.t: John said: 'I didn't see her.' -> John said that he _____ her.
questions.h:
Doğrudan cümlede 'didn't see' (Past Tense) var. Past -> Past Perfect.

KISA DERS: Didn't (V1) -> Hadn't (V3) olur. Didn't see -> Hadn't seen.

questions.t: She asked: 'Where do you live?' -> She asked me where I _____.
questions.h:
Soru cümlesi aktarılıyor. 'Do live' (Present) -> Past.

KISA DERS: Sorular düz cümleye çevrilir ve zaman değişir. Live -> Lived.

questions.t: He asked: 'Are you tired?' -> He asked if I _____ tired.
questions.h:
Yardımcı fiille (Are) başlayan sorular 'If' ile aktarılır. Are -> Was/Were.

KISA DERS: 'I' öznesi için 'Was' kullanılır. He asked if I was tired.

questions.t: The teacher said: 'Sit down.' -> The teacher told us _____ sit down.
questions.h:
Emir cümlesi (Imperative). 'Oturun'.

KISA DERS: Emir cümleleri aktarılırken 'to' kullanılır. Told us TO sit down.

questions.t: He said: 'It may rain.' -> He said that it _____ rain.
questions.h:
Doğrudan cümlede 'may' var.

KISA DERS: May -> Might.

questions.t: She said: 'I was sleeping.' -> She said that she _____ sleeping.
questions.h:
Doğrudan cümlede 'was sleeping' (Past Continuous) var.

KISA DERS: Past Continuous -> Past Perfect Continuous (Had been -ing) olur. Was sleeping -> Had been sleeping.

questions.t: My mother said: 'Don't be late.' -> My mother told me _____ late.
questions.h:
Olumsuz emir cümlesi (Don't...). 

KISA DERS: Olumsuz emirler 'not to' ile aktarılır. Told me NOT TO be late.
